channel.title: unemployed on Working Wheatleys
channel.description: Recent content in unemployed on Working Wheatleys

item.title: Goodbye, ATL! Hola, São Paulo!
item.description: Don’t think of it as goodbye, think of it as see you later. This won’t be the last time I hang my hat in the dirty south.

item.title: Just the Beginning
item.description: My life is at an interesting point right now. I am unemployed and I am essentially homeless. Most of my belongings have been packed up and hidden away – maybe for a year or two or more. It’s very exciting to be starting on this trip. Michael and I have been planning it for years and it’s hard to believe that it has finally come together. Here are some of the preparations we made before leaving the country.
